jello.name: Jello
jello.desc: Concentrated nutrients for biotech. Use it to repair biological armor.

bioframe.name: Bioframe
bioframe.desc: Organic frame for growing Hive ships.

living_armor.name: Living Armor
living_armor.desc: Scale-like armor that can rapidly regenerate itself.

mining_organ.name: Mining Organ
mining_organ.desc: Allows mining ore and boosts harvesting of all tile resources. Useless for combat.

rock_drill.name: Rock Drill
rock_drill.desc: High-power mining equipment. Meant for mining, but can easily make holes in ships too.

hiveling_drone.name: Hiveling Drone
hiveling_drone.desc: Bulky and heavily armed combat drone.

bioframe_vat.name: Bioframe Vat
bioframe_vat.desc: A pod for growing pieces of bioframe.

living_armor_vat.name: Living Armor Vat
living_armor_vat.desc: Grow pieces of living armor. A material that is durable AND regenerates.

chitin_armor.name: Chitin Armor
chitin_armor.desc: A biological armor that regenerates over time.

scale_armor.name: Scale Armor
scale_armor.desc: A biological armor that regenerates over time.

shell_armor.name: Shell Armor
shell_armor.desc: A biological armor that regenerates over time.
